com.example.lab3_restapi.fragments

Class WeatherViewPagerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.example.lab3_restapi.fragments.WeatherViewPagerFragment

  • public class WeatherViewPagerFragment
extends Fragment
    This class holds the ViewPager2 used to navigate between the different forecasts in the app.

      • refreshApiData

        public void refreshApiData(android.app.Activity activity)
        Called from the MainActivity to start refreshing weather data from a new Thread.
        Parameters:

      • restartUpdateTimer

        public void restartUpdateTimer()
        Reset the refresh timer from the WeatherCollectionAdapter. Called when returning from user settings to update the refresh period.
        See Also:
        WeatherCollectionAdapter.restartUpdateTimer(Activity)

      • setTabLayout

      • dpToPixels

        public static int dpToPixels(android.content.res.Resources res,
                             float dip)
        Utility function to convert from density-pixel unit to raw pixels dimension.
        Parameters:
        res - used to get the screen density
        dip - the dp unit to convert
        Returns:
        The amount of pixels corresponding to the dp number based on the screen density.
